head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LEIBOWITZ, SAMUEL W.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LEIBOWITZ, SAMUEL W.

block.p: LEIBOWITZ-Samuel W. The Yeshivah of Flatbush deeply mourns the passing of Samuel W. Leibowitz, beloved father of Honorary President and Honorary Trustee Reuben Leibowitz and Harold and Elihu Leibowitz. Our heartfelt condolences are extended to the entire Leibowitz family. May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Paul Kopyt, President Dennis M. Eisenberg, Exec. V.P.
